entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
